name: Go Fetch
description:
In "Go Fetch" you help a friend getting off the island that you call your home. 

Explore a small island filled with interesting characters and complete various Fetch Quests.

The game is inspired by "A Short Hike" and was made in Unity. You can finish it in about 10-15 minutes.

I am a 21 years old game design student from Germany and this is my second real game. It was made entirely by myself (design, programming, music and sounds) within six months.  You can play it for free  or leave a small donation if you really want to :)

Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.

 I hope you have fun playing!
